definition: Yue Fei (1103-1142), Song dynasty patriot and general
lit. Zhang Fei fights Yue Fei/fig. an impossible combination/an impossible turn of events (idiom)

sentences.english: This is the Temple of General Yue Fei, a 12th-century army hero.
sentences.chinese: 這裏是岳飛將軍廟，岳飛是十二世紀的軍中英雄。

sentences.chinese: 岳飛死的時候才三十九歲。

sentences.chinese: 將軍岳飛率領軍隊勇敢抵抗，終於把敵人打敗。

sentences.chinese: 岳飛的宣言刺痛了現在南宋皇帝的隱痛。
